verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my strength <S%H6697><s%>which <S%H3925>teaches<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H7128><s%> and my <S%H676>fingers<s%> to <S%H4421>fight:<s%>

My <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress;<s%> my <S%H4869>high<s%> <S%H4869>tower,<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> my <S%H4043>shield,<s%> and he in whom I <S%H2620>trust;<s%> who <S%H7286>subdues<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me.
<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H120>man,<s%> that you take <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of him! or the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H582>man,<s%> that you make <S%H2803>account<s%> of him!
<S%H120>Man<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> to <S%H1892>vanity:<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> that <S%H5674>passes<s%> away.
<S%H5186>Bow<s%> your <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down:<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and they shall <S%H6225>smoke.<s%>
<S%H1299>Cast<s%> forth <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them: <S%H7971>shoot<s%> out your <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and <S%H1949>destroy<s%> them.

<S%H7971>Send<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4791>above;<s%> <S%H6475>rid<s%> me, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H1121>children;<s%>

I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> to you, O <S%H430>God:<s%> on a <S%H5035>psaltery<s%> and an instrument of <S%H6218>ten<s%> strings will I <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to you.
It is he that <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> to <S%H4428>kings:<s%> who <S%H6475>delivers<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> from the <S%H7451>hurtful<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H6475>Rid<s%> me, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> and their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood:<s%>

That our <S%H1121>sons<s%> may be as <S%H5195>plants<s%> <S%H1431>grown<s%> up in their <S%H5271>youth;<s%> that our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> may be as <S%H2106>corner<s%> <S%H2106>stones,<s%> <S%H2404>polished<s%> after the <S%H8403>similitude<s%> of a <S%H1964>palace:<s%>

That our <S%H4200>garners<s%> may be <S%H4392>full,<s%> <S%H6329>affording<s%> all <S%H2177>manner<s%> of store: that our <S%H6629>sheep<s%> may <S%H503>bring<s%> forth <S%H503>thousands<s%> and <S%H7231>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands<s%> in our <S%H2351>streets:<s%>

That our <S%H441>oxen<s%> may be strong to <S%H5445>labor;<s%> that there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6556>breaking<s%> in, <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out; that there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6682>complaining<s%> in our <S%H7339>streets.<s%>
<S%H835>Happy<s%> is that <S%H5971>people,<s%> that is in <S%H3602>such<s%> a <S%H3602>case:<s%> yes, <S%H835>happy<s%> is that <S%H5971>people,<s%> whose <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
